item.title: 梅洛尼获得意大利预算支持，2023 年债务被下调
item.description: 对意大利数据进行的多年修订将其债务比率降低了近三个百分点，这为准备公布新预算目标的总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）政府提供了动力。【原文：A multi-year revision of Italy’s data removed almost three percentage points off its debt ratio, offering a boost to premier Giorgia Meloni’s government as it prepares to unveil new budget targets.】

item.description: 德国收益率曲线的一个关键部分已趋于正常，因为交易员们担心欧洲央行将需要加快降息步伐，因为人们越来越担心该地区的经济复苏已失去动力。【原文：A key segment of the German yield curve has normalized as traders bet the European Central Bank will need to accelerate the pace of interest-rate cuts as concerns grow the region’s economic recovery has run out of steam.】

item.description: 西门子股份公司将把电动汽车和卡车充电业务成立为一个完全独立的部门，以寻求新的合作并促进增长。【原文：Siemens AG will set up its electric car and truck charging business as a fully independent unit to pursue new partnerships and boost growth.】

item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）股价下跌，此前德国表示不会再出售该银行的任何股份，此举表明德国反对意大利竞争对手意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的任何收购。【原文：Commerzbank AG dropped after Germany said it won’t sell any more shares in the lender, a move signaling its opposition to any takeover by Italian rival UniCredit SpA.】
